data.name: strAlwaysShowPanelSelection
data.value: Always show panel selection dialog when opening connections

data.name: strAlwaysShowPanelTabs
data.value: 常にパネルのタブを表示

data.name: strAlwaysShowSysTrayIcon
data.value: 常に通知領域アイコンを表示

data.name: strAskUpdatesContent
data.value: {0} can automatically check for updates that may provide new features and bug fixes. It is recommended that you allow {0} to check for updates weekly.

data.name: strAutomaticallyGetSessionInfo
data.value: セッション情報を自動的に取得する

data.name: strButtonDefaultProperties
data.value: デフォルトのプロパティ

data.name: strButtonTestProxy
data.value: プロキシーをテストする

data.name: strCannotImportNormalSessionFile
data.value: You cannot import a normal connection file. Please use File - Open Connection File for normal connection files!

data.name: strCannotStartPortScan
data.value: IPアドレスのフォーマットが正しくないのでポートスキャンの開始に失敗しました
data.comment: Cannot start Port Scan, incorrect IP format!

data.name: strCcEOLFailed
data.value: The (RDP) Sessions feature requires that you have a copy of eolwtscom.dll registered on your system. mRemoteNG ships with this component but it is not registered automatically if you do not use the mRemoteNG Installer. To register it manually, run the following command from an elevated command prompt: regsvr32 "C:\Program Files\mRemoteNG\eolwtscom.dll" (where C:\Program Files\mRemoteNG\ is the path to your mRemoteNG installation). If this check still fails or you are unable to use the (RDP) Sessions feature, please consult the mRemoteNG Forum at http://forum.mremoteng.org/.

data.name: strCcEOLOK
data.value: EOLWTSCOM was found and seems to be registered properly.

data.name: strCcGeckoFailed
data.value: To use the Gecko Rendering Engine you need to have XULrunner 1.8.1.x and the path to the installation set in your Options. You can download XULrunner 1.8.1.3 here: ftp://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/xulrunner/releases/1.8.1.3/contrib/win32/ When you are finished downloading extract the package to a path of your choice. Then in mRemoteNG go to Tools - Options - Advanced and enter the correct path in the XULrunner path field. If you are still not able to pass this check or use the Gecko Engine in mRemoteNG please consult the mRemoteNG Forum at http://forum.mremoteng.org/

data.name: strCcGeckoOK
data.value: GeckoFx was found and seems to be installed properly.

data.name: strCcICAFailed
data.value: ICA requires that the XenDesktop Online Plugin is installed and that the wfica.ocx library is registered. You can download the client here: http://www.citrix.com/download/ If you have the XenDesktop Online Plugin installed and the check still fails, try to register wfica.ocx manually. To do this open up the run dialog (Start - Run) and enter the following: regsvr32 "c:\Program Files\Citrix\ICA Client\wfica.ocx" (Where c:\Program Files\Citrix\ICA Client\ is the path to your XenDesktop Online Plugin installation). If you are still not able to pass this check or use ICA in mRemoteNG please consult the mRemoteNG Forum at http://forum.mremoteng.org/"

data.name: strCcICAOK
data.value: All ICA components were found and seem to be registered properly. Citrix ICA Client Control Version {0}

data.name: strCcNotInstalledProperly
data.value: 正しくインストールされていません

data.name: strCcPuttyFailed
data.value: The SSH, Telnet, Rlogin and RAW protocols need PuTTY to work. PuTTY comes with every mRemoteNG package and is located in the installation path. Please make sure that either you have the Putty.exe in your mRemoteNG directory (default: c:\Program Files\mRemoteNG\) or that you specified a valid path to your PuTTY executable in the Options (Tools - Options - Advanced - Custom PuTTY path)

data.name: strCcPuttyOK
data.value: The PuTTY executable was found and should be ready to use.

data.name: strCcRDPFailed
data.comment: For RDP to work properly you need to have at least Remote Desktop Connection (Terminal Services) Client 6.0 installed. You can download it here: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/925876 If this check still fails or you are unable to use RDP, please consult the mRemoteNG Forum at http://forum.mremoteng.org/.

data.name: strCcRDPOK
data.comment: All RDP components were found and seem to be registered properly. Remote Desktop Connection Control Version {0}

data.name: strCcVNCFailed
data.value: VNC requires VncSharp.dll to be located in your mRemoteNG application folder. Please make sure that you have the VncSharp.dll file in your mRemoteNG application folder (usually C:\Program Files\mRemoteNG\). If you are still not able to pass this check or use VNC in mRemoteNG please consult the mRemoteNG Forum at http://forum.mremoteng.org/

data.name: strCcVNCOK
data.value: All VNC components were found and seem to be registered properly. VncSharp Control Version {0}

data.value: ホスト名かIPアドレスを入力してください

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionAuthenticationLevel
data.value: Select which authentication level this connection should use.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionAuthenticationMode
data.value: Select how you want to authenticate against the VNC server.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionAutomaticResize
data.value: Select whether to automatically resize the connection when the window is resized or when fullscreen mode is toggled. Requires RDC 8.0 or higher.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionCacheBitmaps
data.value: Select whether to use bitmap caching or not.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionColors
data.value: Select the colour quality to be used.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionCompression
data.value: Select the compression value to be used.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionDescription
data.value: Put your notes or a description for the host here.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionDisplayThemes
data.value: Select yes if the theme of the remote host should be displayed.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionDisplayWallpaper
data.value: Select yes if the wallpaper of the remote host should be displayed.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionDomain
data.value: ドメインを入力してください

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionEnableDesktopComposition
data.value: Select whether to use desktop composition or not.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionEnableFontSmoothing
data.value: Select whether to use font smoothing or not.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionEncoding
data.value: Select the encoding mode to be used.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionEncryptionStrength
data.value: Select the encryption strength of the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionExternalTool
data.value: Select the external tool to be started.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionExternalToolAfter
data.value: Select a external tool to be started after the disconnection to the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionExternalToolBefore
data.value: Select a external tool to be started before the connection to the remote host is established.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionIcon
data.value: Choose a icon that will be displayed when connected to the host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionLoadBalanceInfo
data.value: Specifies the load balancing information for use by load balancing routers to choose the best server.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionMACAddress
data.value: Enter the MAC address of the remote host if you wish to use it in an external tool.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionName
data.value: This is the name that will be displayed in the connections tree.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionPanel
data.value: 接続をするパネルを指定
data.comment: Sets the panel in which the connection will open.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionPort
data.value: プロトコルのポートを入力
data.comment: Enter the port the selected protocol is listening on.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionProtocol
data.value: Choose the protocol mRemoteNG should use to connect to the host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionPuttySession
data.value: Select a PuTTY session to be used when connecting.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRDGatewayDomain
data.value: Specifies the domain name that a user provides to connect to the RD Gateway server.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRDGatewayHostname
data.value: Specifies the host name of the Remote Desktop Gateway server.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRDGatewayUsageMethod
data.value: Specifies when to use a Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) server.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRDGatewayUseConnectionCredentials
data.value: Specifies whether or not to log on to the gateway using the same username and password as the connection.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRDGatewayUsername
data.value: Specifies the user name that a user provides to connect to the RD Gateway server.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRedirectDrives
data.value: Select whether local disk drives should be shown on the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRedirectKeys
data.value: Select whether key combinations (e.g. Alt-Tab) should be redirected to the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRedirectPorts
data.value: Select whether local ports (ie. com, parallel) should be shown on the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRedirectPrinters
data.value: Select whether local printers should be shown on the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRedirectSmartCards
data.value: Select whether local smart cards should be available on the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRedirectSounds
data.value: Select how remote sound should be redirected.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionRenderingEngine
data.value: Select one of the available rendering engines that will be used to display HTML.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionResolution
data.value: Choose the resolution or mode this connection will open in.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionSmartSizeMode
data.value: Select the SmartSize mode to be used.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionUseConsoleSession
data.value: Connect to the console session of the remote host.

data.name: strPropertyDescriptionUseCredSsp
data.value: Use the Credential Security Support Provider (CredSSP) for authentication if it is available.

data.value: Feel free to enter any information you need here.
